long_description: With a powerful 360-lumen beam and 4 brightness levels, the Fenix PD12 flashlight sheds a little-or a lot-of light on the issue at hand without weighing down your pack. Features 3 brightness levels plus a burst mode that outputs a stunning 360-lumen beam that shines 120m (394 ft.) to illuminate the darkest forests and trails. High-quality Cree XP-G LED bulb outputs 200 lumens on high, 80 lumens on medium and 10 lumens on low. Click the side switch to turn flashlight on; press and hold down for burst mode, let go to exit burst mode; single clicks rotate through the brightness levels. PD12 remembers the last output level, so the next time you turn it on it starts where you left off. 1 CR123A lithium battery (included) provides 60 hrs. of runtime on low, 6 hrs. 30 min. on medium, 2 hrs. 30 min. on high. Regulated output maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Rugged aircraft-grade aluminum body is designed to resist rolling and has a knurled finish for good grip; flashlight resists impact up to 1 meter. PD12 flashlight has an IPX8 water resistance rating for protection against prolonged immersion in water up to 2m deep. The Fenix PD12 flashlight measures a mere 3 x 1 in., making it easy to carry in a purse, pack or coat pocket.
short_description: With a powerful 360-lumen beam and 4 brightness levels, the Fenix PD12 flashlight sheds a little-or a lot-of light on the issue at hand without weighing down your pack.
